trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked clear go to x: (0) y: (0) point in direction (90 v) ask [Enter the number of sides of a regular polygon:] and wait set [sides v] to (answer) set [turning angle v] to ((360) / (sides)) set [inside angle v] to ((180) - (turning angle)) pen down repeat (sides) move (50) steps turn cw (turning angle) degrees wait (1) secs end pen up say (join (join [Each inside angle is ] (inside angle)) [ degrees.])
